com.eclipsesource.v8.utils

Class V8ObjectUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eclipsesource.v8.utils.V8ObjectUtils

  • public class V8ObjectUtils
extends Object
    A set of static helper methods to convert V8Objects / V8Arrays to java.util Maps and Lists and back again. These conversions perform a deep copy.

    • Method Summary

      Returns an object usable with a V8 Runtime which represents the parameter 'value'.

      Gets a Java Object representing the value at the given index in the V8Array.

      Gets a Java Object representing the value with the given key in the V8Object.

      Pushes a Java Object to a V8Array by first converting it to a V8Value if needed.

    • Method Detail

      • toMap

        public static Map<String,? super Object> toMap(V8Object object)
        Creates a Map from a V8Object using a deep copy. All elements in the V8Object are released after they are accessed. However, the root object itself is not released.
        Parameters:
        object - The root of the V8Object graph.
        Returns:
        A map representing a deep copy of the V8Object rooted at 'object'.

      • toList

        public static List<? super Object> toList(V8Array array)
        Creates a List
